summary_bullets: The Volkswagen 800V platform is a software platform for infotainment systems.
It supports Windows 7 or higher and Apple OS X 10.7 or higher.
The platform requires at least 32 GB of free memory.

citations.title: Volkswagen Map Updates
citations.summary: The article discusses updates to Volkswagen's mapping system, highlighting the use of advanced encryption techniques for secure data transmission, as indicated by the presence of cryptographic signatures and certificates. It also mentions the integration of various technical protocols to enhance the accuracy and reliability of navigation data. The content suggests a focus on improving user experience through regular updates and robust security measures.

citations.title: Volkswagen Map Updates
citations.summary: The article provides technical specifications for Volkswagen's electric vehicle models, detailing their combined energy consumption and CO₂ emissions. The ID.3 has an energy consumption of 16.2 kWh/100 km, while the ID.4 and ID.5 have consumptions of 18.7 and 18.6 kWh/100 km, respectively. The ID.7 has a combined energy consumption of 16.3 kWh/100 km, with all models reporting zero CO₂ emissions and classified in CO₂ Class A.

citations.title: Volkswagen Volkswagen
citations.summary: The Volkswagen T-Roc models, including the T-Roc Style and T-Roc R-Line, have a combined fuel consumption of 6.0-5.6 l/100 km and CO2 emissions ranging from 137-128 g/km, placing them in the CO2 class E-D. In contrast, the ID.3 GTX Performance FIRE+ICE boasts a combined energy consumption of 16.8-15.0 kWh/100 km with zero CO2 emissions, categorizing it in the CO2 class A. Both vehicles feature powerful designs, innovative drivetrains, and a variety of assistance systems and technologies.

citations.title: DiscoverCare - Volkswagen
citations.summary: The DiscoverCare application for Volkswagen supports Microsoft Windows (version 7 or higher) and Apple OS X (version 10.7 or higher), requiring a minimum of 32 GB free memory capacity on the hard drive, with a recommended 64 GB for optimal performance. The installation process offers two options: using an EXE file for direct installation, which may require administrator rights if the certificate is unrecognized, or downloading a ZIP file for a non-installation method. Memory card requirements vary based on the navigation system and selected map material.

citations.title: Connectivity - Volkswagen
citations.summary: Volkswagen's website utilizes cookies to enhance user experience and communication, requiring user consent for data processing related to analytics and personalization. Users can manage their cookie preferences through an 'Agree and continue' option or the 'Set cookie preferences' button, with the ability to revoke consent at any time. Necessary cookies are implemented to enable basic website functions, ensuring proper navigation and access to secure areas.

citations.title: Softwareupdates - Volkswagen
citations.summary: The Volkswagen website utilizes cookies to enhance user experience and improve communication, requiring user consent for data processing related to analytics and personalization. Users can manage their cookie preferences through an interface that allows them to agree to or customize their consent, with the option to revoke it at any time. Necessary cookies are essential for basic website functions, such as navigation and access to secure areas.

TRL.rationale: The Volkswagen 800V platform is a software platform that supports existing operating systems, indicating it has moved beyond basic principles and is likely in a prototype or testing phase, but not yet proven in an operational environment.

MRL.rationale: While the platform is developed and supports specific operating systems, it may not yet be in full-rate production, indicating it is still in the development or limited production stage.

CRAAP.rationale: The information is current and relevant to the automotive industry, but the authority and accuracy could be improved with more specific citations or data sources. The purpose is clear as it relates to infotainment systems.

Materiality.rationale: The platform is relevant to the automotive sector, particularly in the context of infotainment systems, but its overall impact on broader sustainability or financial metrics is not fully established.

ISSB.rationale: The platform's development aligns with emerging KPIs in the automotive sector, but lacks comprehensive sustainability metrics or disclosures that would elevate it to a higher score.

OTA_Compliance.rationale: The platform is compliant with ISO 24089 and UNECE R156 standards, indicating it meets current regulatory requirements for over-the-air updates.
